sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, FormArray, Validators, NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-document-edit', templateUrl: './document-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./document-edit.component.css'] }) export class DocumentEditComponent implements OnInit { originalDocument: Document; document: Document; editMode: boolean = false; ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit(f: NgForm) { console.log(f) console.log("Value is", f) } }
